means: 根深蒂固的，牢固的，固守的
用壕沟围绕或保护…( entrench的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Sexism is deeply entrenched in our society.
sentence.Network_cn: 性别歧视在我们这个社会根深蒂固。

sentence.Network_en: He has repeatedly criticized Western churches as too worldly and too entrenched in consumerism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一再批评西方教会过于世俗，消费主义观念过于顽固。

sentence.Network_en: The Nationalists entrenched their power further by adding six seats to the Parliament.
sentence.Network_cn: 国民党人在议会中新增了6个席位,从而进一步稳固了他们的势力.

轻慢佳人 ... sniper n. 狙击兵 entrenched a. 根深蒂固的 mustard n. 芥末.

超纲词汇 - 明明的日志 - 网易博客 ... entitlement n. 权利 entrenched a. 确立的，不容易改的（风俗习惯） epithet n. 绰号，称号.

entry.tran: 使（权力、习俗、观念等）根深蒂固
entry.def: If something such as power, a custom, or an idea is entrenched, it is firmly established, so that it would be difficult to change it.

example.ex: ...a series of measures designed to entrench democracy and the rule of law...
example.tran: 旨在巩固民主和法制的一系列措施

example.ex: These dictators have entrenched themselves politically and are difficult to move.
example.tran: 这些独裁者在政治上已经站稳了脚跟，很难推翻他们。

auth_sentence.content: They had come to fight but instead sat entrenched.
auth_sentence.res_content: They had come to fight but instead sat entrenched.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They had come to fight but instead sat entrenched.

auth_sentence.content: He was an entrenched opponent of modern biblical scholarship.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was an entrenched opponent of modern biblical scholarship.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was an entrenched opponent of modern biblical scholarship.

auth_sentence.content: Entrenched in Tahrir Square, they demanded he resign.
auth_sentence.res_content: Entrenched in Tahrir Square, they demanded he resign.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Entrenched in Tahrir Square, they demanded he resign.

means.word_mean: 根深蒂固的；牢固的；固守的

sentences.en: Television seems to be firmly entrenched as the number one medium for national advertising.
sentences.cn: 电视看来要在全国广告媒介中牢固地占据头等位置。

sentences.en: If the enemy dares to attack us in these entrenched positions,we will make short work of them.
sentences.cn: 如果敌人胆敢进攻我们固守的阵地,我们就消灭他们。
